subject: [R] adjusting a power model in R
body:
Dear R-gurus,

How can I fit a power model in R? I would like adjust Y = b0*X^b1 or something like. 

Kind regards,

Miltinho
Brazil.

and provide commented, minimal, self-contained, reproducible code.
